answers.author: Dustin Anderson
answers.text:
I have salary detail for CT. However, I am uncomfortable sharing this information without knowing who will be in receipt of it. 
Contact me directly and I will gladly share it with you if appropriate.

answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Salary information is complimentary to members (scroll to the bottom of that page): http://icma.org/en/Page/559/Salary_Information
Others are free to subscribe for salary access.
